Title: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Another Story - Kako to Mirai no Message Specials
Description: ['These specials feature the Oshitari cousins in a Manzai (漫才) setup [a style of stand-up comedy in Japan, which usually involves two performers—a straight man (tsukkomi) and a funny man (boke)].', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' Story 1 involves Oshitari Yuuhi who is tired of being the ', tsukkomi, ' and wants to try his hand at being a ', boke, ' but with disastrous results.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' Story 2 is about Oshitari Kenya in the role of a ', boke, " whose jokes didn't get through to the audience in a joint Namiwa-Seishun Talentshow."]
Related: ['Parent story: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Another Story - Kako to Mirai no Message']
